verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104>"Keep<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

It shall be on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H6965>you,<s%> that you shall set yourself up <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H7874>plaster<s%> them with <S%H7874>plaster:<s%>

and you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> on them all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law,<s%> when you have passed <S%H5674>over;<s%> that you may go <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H776>you,<s%> a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has promised <S%H1696>you.<s%>

It shall <S%H5674>be,<s%> when you have passed over the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that you shall set <S%H6965>up<s%> these <S%H68>stones,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> and you shall <S%H7875>plaster<s%> them with <S%H7875>plaster.<s%>

There you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stones:<s%> you shall lift <S%H5130>up<s%> no iron on <S%H1270>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8003>uncut<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> and you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> thereon to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%>
and you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8055>there;<s%> and you shall rejoice <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H68>stones<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H3190>very<s%> <S%H874>plainly.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Keep <S%H5535>silence,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> you have <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"These shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> when you have passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

These shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%> for the <S%H7045>curse:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer,<s%> and <S%H6030>tell<s%> all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7311>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%>

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> an <S%H6459>engraved<s%> or molten <S%H4541>image,<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsman,<s%> and <S%H7760>sets<s%> it up in <S%H5643>secret.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who sets <S%H7034>light<s%> by his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H5253>removes<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1366>landmark.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who makes the <S%H5787>blind<s%> to <S%H7686>wander<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H5186>deprives<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and <S%H490>widow<s%> of <S%H4941>justice.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> because he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with any kind of <S%H929>animal.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H517>mother.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H2859>mother-in<s%>-law.' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'
<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> in <S%H5643>secret.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> to <S%H5221>kill<s%> an <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H5315>person.<s%>' All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'

<S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H6965>doesn't<s%> confirm the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5971>them.<s%>' All the people shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543><s%> 'Amen.'"
